import { TypedArray } from 'web3-types'; // Explicitly check for the
// eslint-disable-next-line @typescript-eslint/ban-types

export const isNullish = item => // Using "null" value intentionally for validation
// eslint-disable-next-line no-null/no-null
item === undefined || item === null;
export const isObject = item => typeof item === 'object' && !isNullish(item) && !Array.isArray(item) && !(item instanceof TypedArray);
